1490720.name: Clarevoyance Soundtrack
1490720.description:
Official soundtrack of Clarevoyance, featuring music from Clare artists Normand Pothier, P'tit Belliveau, Arthur Comeau, Nicolas Pierre Boudreau, JonahMeltWave, Guyaume Boulianne, and Michael Saulnier.

Profits from the sale of this soundtrack go to our community radio, Radio CIFA 104.1 FM, Le son du Sud-Ouest!

This project acknowledges the support of the Government of Canada, the Municipality of Clare, and the Province of Nova Scotia.

Voice over, tracks 1 & 7: Nicole Boudreau
Voices recorded by Arthur Comeau
Soundtrack normalization by Normand Pothier
Cover art print by Sheila LeBlanc with graphic design by Marc d'Entremont
